attributes.action: tell the EU  be told that no means no
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if any country in the EU has a no vote on a treaty then the EU should  accept the will of the people and not rail road them in to having a new vote until the EU gets the vote it wants

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
